original_query: select MIN(p1.toNode) from wiki p1, wiki p2, wiki p3 where p1.toNode = p2.fromNode AND p2.toNode = p3.fromNode
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM wiki AS wiki
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM wiki AS wiki
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.ToNode=E3.FromNode)
CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM wiki AS wiki
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E1 AS SELECT MIN(FromNode) AS EXPR$0 FROM E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E1 WHERE E2E3.FromNode=E1.ToNode)
